name: Sagasu HD
description:
Play a quick game of Sagasu in your browser, or scroll down to download the game and experience all that Sagasu has to offer including over 10 unlockable characters and full HD resolution!

Finally, the much-loved game arrives for Desktops!Experience Sagasu's uniquely tranquil, relaxing gameplay with the original full HD artwork.

Easy one-button gameplay and accessible game design- Pick up and play anytime, anywhere. Play in short bursts or play longer to gain bonuses as you experience new environments, weather effects and more challenges.

Collect crystals as you soar above lakes, castles and hills through rain, snow and sunshine. Experience different environments as you aim to collect as many crystals as possible and fly as far as you can. Unlock hidden characters and content!

Become enthralled in SAGASU's mysterious world- Beautiful hand-drawn graphics and atmospheric music accompanies your adventure.

Sagasu is a free game, so please try it and our other games out today!
